bug.short_desc: fix failures due to too fast task submission in TracTaskDataHandlerXmlRpcTest

long_desc.thetext:
http://ci.mylyn.org/job/mylyn-3.10.x/23/TARGET=luna/testReport/junit/org.eclipse.mylyn.trac.tests.core/TracTaskDataHandlerXmlRpcTest/testAttachmentChangesLastModifiedDate_0_11_7_XML_RPC/
junit.framework.AssertionFailedError: Expected Tue Oct 22 07:42:32 CDT 2013 to be more recent than Tue Oct 22 07:42:32 CDT 2013 at junit.framework.Assert.fail(Assert.java:57) at junit.framework.Assert.assertTrue(Assert.java:22) at junit.framework.TestCase.assertTrue(TestCase.java:192) at org.eclipse.mylyn.trac.tests.core.TracTaskDataHandlerXmlRpcTest.testAttachmentChangesLastModifiedDate(TracTaskDataHandlerXmlRpcTest.java:207)
http://ci.mylyn.org/job/mylyn-3.10.x/23/TARGET=e3.8/testReport/junit/org.eclipse.mylyn.trac.tests.core/TracTaskDataHandlerXmlRpcTest/testPostTaskDataMidAirCollision_0_11_7_XML_RPC/
junit.framework.ComparisonFailure: expected:<[Mid-air collision occurred. Synchronize task and re-submit changes.]> but was:<['columns ticket, time, field are not unique' while executing 'ticket.update()']> at junit.framework.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:85) at junit.framework.Assert.assertEquals(Assert.java:91) at org.eclipse.mylyn.trac.tests.core.TracTaskDataHandlerXmlRpcTest.testPostTaskDataMidAirCollision(TracTaskDataHandlerXmlRpcTest.java:449)
The fix seems to have worked. I have applied it for master, 3.10 and 3.9.2.
